actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ((2S,4R)/(2R,4S)/(2R,4R)/(2S,4S))-1-(2-(4-(4-chloro-phenoxy)-2-chlorophenyl)-4-methyl-1,3-dioxolan-2-yl-methyl)-1H-1,2,4-triazole.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on ((2S,4R)-(2R,4S)- ((2R,4R)-(2S,4S)-1-(2- (4-(4-chloro phenoxy(-2-chlorophenyl)-4-methyl- 1,3-dioxolan-2-yl-methyl)-1H- 1,2,4-triazole.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ((2S,4R)/(2R,4S)/(2R,4R)/(2S,4S))-1-(2-(4-(4-chloro-phenoxy)-2-chlorophenyl)-4-methyl-1,3-dioxolan-2-yl-methyl)-1H-1,2,4-triazole.
